summary: A early game player home in Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
[line]

[center][color=Black][size=4]Stonewall Farm[/size][/color][/center] 

[center][color=Black][size=4]by StarfleetCommand[/size][/color][/center] 

[color=Black][size=3]Version             :[/size][/color]1.0

[color=Black][size=3]Date                :[/size][/color]08/13/2012

[color=Black][size=3]Category            :[/size][/color]Abodes - Player homes

[line] 

This mod requires the Hearthfire DLC to work. 

[line] 



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center] My first mod. Made it simple, no fancy scripted objects etc.
This is a small, early game Player home in Riverwood. It has safe storage, two 
bookshelves, Two Weapon Plaques and four weapon displays. Also included is an Alchemy lab and 
enchanting table, On the porch there is a Blacksmiths anvil, a grinding stone and a tanning 
rack. A Small vegetables garden is also included. The House is fully navmeshed, follower compatible  [/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Credits[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]Bethesda Softworks[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on th steam network.

[/list] 

[line]
